title: Fury Bowser

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Flame Breath**: Rampage attack a player, Torching them and all Visitors, Can only be used on nights 3, 6, 9, and so on.
- **Fury**: Choose yourself as the normal Koopa attacker this night, Dealing a Torching Basic attack to a target.

desc:
Post 1813
*The beast's fury has grown too strong. The light of the Cat Shines can no longer keep it at bay...*
